[u][b][size=15pt][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=usnqnGqZDTY]Click here to watch the fishing video[/url][/size][/b][/u]
I guess I'll keep that up. Anyway, lock topic now. The server's public.

item.title: Rune Revision - Now Public
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Well, I’m disappointed to say the server did not launch last night. However, it wasn’t my fault. My internet dropped, and I’m not sure why. There was a storm right as it dropped, but I doubt it had anything to do with it.

I’ll be putting it on the server status page shortly.

EDIT: Okay. I’ve finished everything for the release – Jewelry enchanting, NPC drops, thieving, smithing, and bug fixes. I want to test everything first to make sure it’s all good.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Revision - Now Public
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Alright guys. I’m going to release the server early, like today early or something to play on, and develop it over time. I’m doing this because I’ve had people play my server and it’s great the way it is, and no point to hold it back.

There’s nothing new worth changing the title for, but, I have added the following.
-Jailing, not Delta’s shit.
-Bandos whip (Yay…)
-Loading NPC animations and hit stuff from a CFG (Let’s just hope you see it in the tutorial section soon)

Now, the only thing that’s left is NPC drops, maybe some final touchups I find, and changing the game frame color to white, because I saw how sexy it looked.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Perhaps. Also, your signature. You got that from me If I remember, I put it in the Back to Basics download thread.

Anyway, I’m going to add jewelry enchanting next, because I hate mining iron and smelting it, and then only having half of my inventory become iron bars.

item.title: Rune Revision - Now Public
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“ax mx yxx, post:72, topic:287037”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=379587.msg2863687#msg2863687 date=1247330303]

Client frame is ugly, wings are unrealistic, rocks should be spread out cause they look bad in a line.

Also, make training too fast, and by the time they get all combat 99s, they’ll quit cause there’s no achievement, and everything’s too easy.
[/quote]Training won’t be too fast. As I stated, rocks are just there for testing purposes. With skilling being my favorite thing in a private server, I know what’s best. For the client frame, I can give a shit less. It’s gray.

I hope you use a different client, I would not want to play anything that used that shitty client, I have no idea why so many people use it.

Couldnt agree more. Bluurs client seriously fails ass(no offence bluur). Deltas is good but the cache is messed up with some model over written… but deltascape client v16 is the best.

Well the bluur’s cilent your referring to is the one that he released that is old. If you have taken a look at Bluur’s cilent work for that then you would think otherwise. I think it’s the best cilent I’ve ever seen. Nice Job Lin O: This is epic simply epic : p[/quote]

The client is still shit.

Read full topic

Couldnt agree more. Bluurs client seriously fails ass(no offence bluur). Deltas is good but the cache is messed up with some model over written… but deltascape client v16 is the best.[/quote]
